item.title: Video Editor for Real Estate Youtube Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create engaging and professional Youtube ads for our real estate business.

The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing and a strong understanding of the real estate industry.

The main responsibility will be to edit and enhance raw footage (ADD B-ROLL ,ETC)  to create visually appealing ads.

The videos should be optimized for Youtube and other social media platforms, with attention to details such as color grading, sound design, and text overlays.

  As a video editor for real estate ads, you should have:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro)
  - Knowledge of video optimization techniques for Youtube and social media platforms
  - Familiarity with the real estate industry and its marketing trends
  - Strong attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work under tight deadlines
  - Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate with our marketing team

Budget: $10,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 23:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social media mgmt and creative for male supplement brand |HIGH PRODUCTION - Upwork
item.description:
We are a new male supplement brand dedicated to improving men's health and wellness through natural supplements. Founded by a successful woman model, we will be utilizing her audience but fully growing organically on our own to scale.

As a rapidly growing startup, we are looking for a dynamic and creative Social Media Manager with Graphic Design and Video experience to join our passionate team.

Job Description:

We are seeking an experienced and enthusiastic Social Media Manager with a strong background in graphic design and video production. This role is critical to enhancing our brand presence and engagement across various social media platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Social Media Strategy:
   - Develop and execute a robust social media strategy to increase brand awareness, engagement, and customer loyalty.

WE NEED SOMEONE WHO CAN PRODUCE 14x HIGH QUALITY REELS/TIK TOKS A DAY AND 25X STORIES A WEEK

2. Content Creation:
   - Design visually compelling graphics and illustrations for social media posts, stories

   - Write engaging and compelling captions tailored to each social media platform.

-We will be proving UGC content to use but want it to be a well oiled machine like link provided below

https://www.instagram.com/testorizemen?igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

-Work together to create brand pillars

3. Community Management:
   - Engage with our audience by responding to comments, messages, and mentions in a timely and authentic manner.

   - Monitor and analyze social media trends, industry news, and competitors to stay ahead of the curve.

4. Analytics and Reporting:
   - Track, analyze, and report on social media performance metrics.
   - Use data insights to optimize content and enhance strategy.


Qualifications:
- Proven experience as a Social Media Manager, preferably in the health and wellness or supplement industry.

- Exceptional graphic design skills with proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
- Strong video editing skills with experience in software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.

- Excellent copywriting skills and the ability to craft compelling and engaging captions.

- In-depth knowledge of various social media platforms, IG and Tik tok will be our focus to start

- Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret social media metrics and derive actionable insights.

- Creative mindset with an eye for detail and a passion for storytelling.

- Ability to multitask and manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment.

- A self-starter with excellent communication and organizational skills.

**Bonus Skills:**
- Knowledge of SEO and web traffic metrics.
- Experience with influencer marketing.

**How to Apply:**
If you are passionate about social media and have a flair for design and video production, we would love to hear from you!
Please send your resume, portfolio showcasing your graphic design and video work, and accounts you have grown  and a cover letter



Posted On: June 19, 2024 23:02 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, AI Content Creation, Community Management, Campaign Management, Instagram Story, Health & Wellness, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Social Media Management, AI Content Creation, Community Management, Campaign Management, Instagram Story, Health & Wellness, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor + Motion Graphics Wanted For Explainer & Other Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a competent and self-managed video production expert to assist with our marketing content creation.

I work on behalf of the Marketing department for IGS Group, a B2B technology company based in Australia. We are seeking someone with video editing and motion graphics abilities to produce internal and external facing video content for us based on briefs and sample footage.

Our perfect candidate would be available during Australian business hours, fluent in English with strong communication skills and creative thinking and able to autonomously turn around video content from brief to delivery in a quick amount of time.

Work will be completed on a project-by-project basis, with specific milestones to hit and a flexible amount of hours per project depending on scope and complexity.

We will need raw files turned over in addition to the final cut - but outside of that you are free to use whatever tools and software you like - if the final product looks good that's all that matters.

Our first project is an introduction explainer promotional video for our natively owned software platform - please include details in your proposal if you have experience working on similar projects or making explanation videos featuring animation, screen recordings and creative graphics.

Hourly Range: $15.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 22:56 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Storyboarding
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Storyboarding
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Explainer Video Creator for Local Government Clients - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented freelancer to create short explainer videos for our local government clients. This position is to replace a longtime employee who is leaving, and we need someone who can continue producing high-quality videos.

Job Requirements:

*Ability to produce short, engaging explainer videos
*Experience with animation and video editing
*Strong portfolio showcasing relevant work

Example of Required Work:

Here is an example of the type of videos we need: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XsBqMe62-ZU. Please review this video to ensure you can meet our quality standards.

Questions to Answer in Your Proposal:

Can you produce similar videos to the one linked above?
What is your typical cost per minute of video?
What's your typical process for working with a client?
Can you provide several relevant example videos from your portfolio?
Additional Information:

Our company is goodcityco.com and work with local government clients.

If you are interested in this opportunity and believe you have the skills to create videos of this caliber, please apply with your portfolio, answers to the questions above, and relevant example videos.

Looking forward to your proposals! Aaron

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00

Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Explainer Video

item.description:
We are seeking a talented Social Media Content Creator to join our team and help us promote our Software Company Innovizzo. As a Content Creator, you will be responsible for posting engaging videos on our Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok accounts twice a day. The content should showcase our real estate software and highlight its unique features.

    Responsibilities:

    - Develop creative concepts and storylines for each video
    - Post videos on Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok daily

    Requirements:

    - Strong understanding of social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok)
    - Excellent communication and storytelling skills
    - Knowledge of real estate industry is a plus

item.title: Video Editor Needed! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello video editors!
We are a very fast growing creative agency and we are looking for a great video editor to enter our team. We create compelling content for a variety of audiences.

Responsibilities:

Editing Magic: Use Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects to transform raw footage into polished videos.
Follow Instructions: Collaborate with our team to understand and execute project goals.
Project Sharing: Efficiently handle project sharing to ensure quick turnaround on small changes.
Communication: Maintain strong communication and availability to meet project deadlines.

Requirements:

Experience: 2-3 years of video editing experience, with a strong portfolio.
Technical Proficiency: Skilled in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
Attention to Detail: Creative eye and attention to detail.
Team Player: Positive attitude and willingness to collaborate.

Why Join Us?

Creative Freedom: Experiment and innovate with your editing.
Flexible Work: Remote work from your own space.
Growth Opportunities: Opportunities for professional development and growth.

How to Apply:
Send your portfolio, and a cover letter explaining why you’re the perfect fit. Include "$bom-" in your application. We review all applications, so make yours stand out!

Hourly Range: $7.00-$12.00

item.title: Got a clean video setup? We’ll pay you $300 per hour - Upwork
item.description:
If you’re the right person, this will take you 1hr or less.

What you need is:

- You speak English
- You have a video setup - one that looks anywhere between this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ECoXhz0K0k and this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aAgsIPrTsBA
- Bonus points: your video setup has a 2nd camera for a B-roll

If you have the video setup, we need you to record the content of our guide.

Context on us:

- We write authentication guides for luxury items: clothing, sneakers, bags, watches.
- So that means luxury, hyped or streetwear brands: LV, Adidas, Air Jordan, Rolex, Gucci, etc.
- All of it is unique content, with pictures.
- The guides are usually a bullet point list, so they’re perfect for guiding your video. The guides are already made in a bullet-point-like list.

When our video editor puts this all together, we’ll use: your content + B-rolls from you + B-rolls from the internet (if they fit ) + we’ll add our pictures to your image (side-by-side, overlay, at one point we’ll make them full-screen).

** From you, we just need the raw video of you talking. We need this to be punchy: short and concise, so that it's delivering value to our viewers (they want to learn how to authenticate an item) as soon as possible **

To apply:

- We’re looking for someone who’s recorded similar content in the past. Your work will speak for itself. Just send a link to the video(s).
- If you haven’t done this in the past, this won’t work. (We need at least a sample of what you can do). Also, when applying, start the application with "Not a robot" so I know you're not sending an automated message.
- After 1-2 videos, if we’re confident you’re the one, we’re happy to sign a contract for 50+ videos (so a 5-figure contract).

Hourly Range: $150.00-$300.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 22:38 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Voice-Over Recording
Skills: Voice-Over Recording
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Subtitle Downloader - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled freelancer to download subtitles from this YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@medicalcodingclarified/videos?view=0&sort=dd&shelf_id=2. We need all the subtitles in the videos and save them in a TXT file format. The task involves the following responsibilities:

- Accessing specified YouTube videos
- Extracting and downloading the subtitles
- Organizing and saving the subtitles in a TXT file

This is a small project with an estimated duration of under 1 month. We are seeking an entry-level professional who is eager to gain experience in subtitle extraction and management.

ChatGPT suggested solution: https://chatgpt.com/share/d99c94b3-9c08-4a25-9aff-ead5642c5922

To extract subtitles from a set of YouTube videos, you can use a tool called youtube-dl along with some additional scripting to handle multiple videos. Here are the steps you can follow:

Install youtube-dl and ffmpeg:

For Windows: Download youtube-dl from here and place it in a directory included in your system's PATH. Install ffmpeg from here and add it to your PATH as well.
For macOS: Install via Homebrew with brew install youtube-dl and brew install ffmpeg.
For Linux: Install via your package manager, e.g., sudo apt-get install youtube-dl ffmpeg.
Create a list of video URLs:
Create a text file (e.g., video_urls.txt) with each line containing a YouTube video URL from which you want to extract subtitles.

Write a script to download subtitles:
You can use a simple Python script to automate the process. Here's a script that reads the URLs from the text file and downloads the subtitles:

import subprocess

# Read video URLs from a file
with open('video_urls.txt', 'r') as file:
    video_urls = file.readlines()

for url in video_urls:
    url = url.strip()
    if url:
        # Command to download subtitles
        command = [
            'youtube-dl',
            '--write-auto-sub',  # Download automatically generated subtitles
            '--sub-lang', 'en',  # Specify the language of the subtitles
            '--skip-download',  # Do not download the video
            '-o', '%(title)s.%(ext)s',  # Output filename template
            url
        ]
        subprocess.run(command)

print("Subtitles have been downloaded.")
Run the script:
Save the script as download_subtitles.py and run it using Python:

python download_subtitles.py
Access the subtitles:
The subtitles will be saved in the same directory as the script, with filenames based on the video titles.

This method extracts the automatically generated subtitles (if available) in English. If you need subtitles in a different language, replace 'en' in the --sub-lang option with the appropriate language code.

Notes:
Ensure that youtube-dl and ffmpeg are properly installed and accessible from the command line.
You can modify the script to handle different output directories or additional processing as needed.

Budget: $55
Posted On: June 19, 2024 22:30 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Subtitles, Data Entry, Python, Video Editing
Skills: Subtitles, Data Entry, Python, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.ns0:encoded:
We are looking for a skilled freelancer to download subtitles from this YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@medicalcodingclarified/videos?view=0&sort=dd&shelf_id=2. We need all the subtitles in the videos and save them in a TXT file format. The task involves the following responsibilities:

- Accessing specified YouTube videos
- Extracting and downloading the subtitles
- Organizing and saving the subtitles in a TXT file

This is a small project with an estimated duration of under 1 month. We are seeking an entry-level professional who is eager to gain experience in subtitle extraction and management.

ChatGPT suggested solution: https://chatgpt.com/share/d99c94b3-9c08-4a25-9aff-ead5642c5922

To extract subtitles from a set of YouTube videos, you can use a tool called youtube-dl along with some additional scripting to handle multiple videos. Here are the steps you can follow:

Install youtube-dl and ffmpeg:

For Windows: Download youtube-dl from here and place it in a directory included in your system's PATH. Install ffmpeg from here and add it to your PATH as well.
For macOS: Install via Homebrew with brew install youtube-dl and brew install ffmpeg.
For Linux: Install via your package manager, e.g., sudo apt-get install youtube-dl ffmpeg.
Create a list of video URLs:
Create a text file (e.g., video_urls.txt) with each line containing a YouTube video URL from which you want to extract subtitles.

Write a script to download subtitles:
You can use a simple Python script to automate the process. Here's a script that reads the URLs from the text file and downloads the subtitles:

import subprocess

# Read video URLs from a file
with open('video_urls.txt', 'r') as file:
    video_urls = file.readlines()

for url in video_urls:
    url = url.strip()
    if url:
        # Command to download subtitles
        command = [
            'youtube-dl',
            '--write-auto-sub',  # Download automatically generated subtitles
            '--sub-lang', 'en',  # Specify the language of the subtitles
            '--skip-download',  # Do not download the video
            '-o', '%(title)s.%(ext)s',  # Output filename template
            url
        ]
        subprocess.run(command)

print("Subtitles have been downloaded.")
Run the script:
Save the script as download_subtitles.py and run it using Python:

python download_subtitles.py
Access the subtitles:
The subtitles will be saved in the same directory as the script, with filenames based on the video titles.

This method extracts the automatically generated subtitles (if available) in English. If you need subtitles in a different language, replace 'en' in the --sub-lang option with the appropriate language code.

Notes:
Ensure that youtube-dl and ffmpeg are properly installed and accessible from the command line.
You can modify the script to handle different output directories or additional processing as needed.

Budget: $55
Posted On: June 19, 2024 22:30 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Subtitles, Data Entry, Python, Video Editing
Skills: Subtitles, Data Entry, Python, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: YouTube Video Editor (Travel and Lifestyle) - Upwork
item.description:
Travel and lifestyle brand looking for a talented YouTube Video Editor to join our team and help bring our adventures to life.

Responsibilities:
- Edit straightforward travel and lifestyle videos for our YouTube channel.
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film.
- Input music, graphics, and effects as needed.
- Ensure the final product aligns with our brand's style and message.
- Collaborate with the content creator to understand the vision and deliver high-quality videos.

Requirements:
- Proficiency in video editing software.
- Strong understanding of the travel and lifestyle niche.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Creative mind and storytelling skills.
- Attention to detail.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00

Category: Video Editing

Some inspiration for what we're looking for is the same kind of vibe (without copying) as Packsia, Social Stocks, Content Cove, Womensidehustle (on IG), Facelessmethod (on IG).

If all goes well with this, we will make this an on-going project.

Please note: You *must* give sole ownership of the videos and videos to us with no restrictions.
